titleStmt.title: Noah's flood returning: or, a sermon preached August the 7th. 1655. before the right honourable Christopher Pack, Lord Major of the honourable citie of London, and the right worshipfull, the company of Drapers. By R. Gell, D.D. and rector of the parish of Mary Alder-Mary, London.
titleStmt.author: Gell, Robert, 1595-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.L. and are to be sold by Giles Calvert ay the Black-spread Eagle, at the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Giles Calvert ay the Black-spread Eagle
